00108 
00109         ~TelescopeData() {
00110             if (analyzer) delete analyzer;
00111             if (muonanalyzer) delete muonanalyzer;
00112             if (cleaner) delete cleaner;
00113             if (lensize) delete lensize;
00114             if (pictubes) delete pictubes;
00115             if (phihist) delete phihist;
00116             if (alphahist) delete alphahist;
00117             if (lengthhist) delete lengthhist;
00118             if (sizehist) delete sizehist;
00119             if (disthist) delete disthist;
00120             if (widthhist) delete widthhist;
00121             if (rawrate) delete rawrate;
00122             if (max2hist) delete max2hist;
00123             if (centroids) delete centroids;
00124             if (musoalhist) delete musoalhist;
00125             if (musizehist) delete musizehist;
00126             if (mugainhist) delete mugainhist;
00127             if (mulensizehist) delete mulensizehist;
00128             if (muonnesshist) delete muonnesshist;
00129         }

00131     };
